meta.title: The Impostor Rules - How to Play
meta.description: Learn how to play The Impostor. Complete rules, scoring system and tips.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.description: is a game where in each match, players must discover who among them is the
introduction.description2: : an infiltrator who doesn't know a secret word that everyone else knows, and must blend in while trying to figure it out to win.
introduction.recommendationText: A minimum of 4 players is required. It's ideal to play in person or via video call to facilitate the clue round and debate.

objective.title: Objective
objective.description: The objective depends on your role. Games last a maximum of
objective.asFriendText: Discover the Impostor by voting for them in the elimination round. The more correct votes you accumulate, the more points you earn.
objective.asImpostorText: Survive all 3 rounds without being discovered. If you survive the third round, you win the game.

requirements.title: What do you need to play?
requirements.phone: You only need your phone to stay connected to the game.
requirements.browser: , you play directly in your browser.
requirements.communication: Clue communication and debate is done
requirements.inPerson: in person or via video call

preparation.title: Preparation
preparation.step1Text: One player enters the website, logs in and creates the game. They choose if the Impostor will have a Hint.
preparation.step2Text: The Host shares the invite link with the other players.
preparation.step3Text: Other players enter the link, log in and automatically join the room.
preparation.step4Text: When everyone is in the room, the Host starts the game.

gameplay.title: How the Game Works
gameplay.step1Text: The app assigns roles and the secret word.
gameplay.step1Warning: Don't tell anyone what card you got!
gameplay.step1ImpostorText: Doesn't see the word. If help is enabled, they'll see the category it belongs to.
gameplay.step2Text: When it's your turn, you must say a clue related to the word out loud.
gameplay.step2Warning: It shouldn't be too obvious (to not help the Impostor) or too vague (to not seem suspicious).
gameplay.step3Text: Once everyone has given their clue, voting begins. When everyone votes, the result is revealed.
gameplay.step4Text: The player with the most votes is eliminated from the game and won't play the next round.
gameplay.step4IfImpostorText: The game ends and the Impostor loses.
gameplay.step4IfFriendText: The Impostor survives, earns points and the game continues for another round.

scoring.title: Scoring System
scoring.perRoundVote: For each round you vote for the impostor:
scoring.bonusFriend: Bonus (vote correctly all rounds and impostor loses):
scoring.tiesText: If there's a tie in the vote, no one is eliminated and the Impostor gets their points for that round.
